item.title: Charlie Kirk’s Assassination Feels Different Because It Marks The Start Of A New Culture War
item.description: Charlie Kirk’s assassination served as a true turning point. Democrats are in no way prepared for the fallout.

item.title: Charlie Kirk’s Assassination Shows We Cannot ‘Come Together’ If We Cannot Even Coexist
item.description: I don’t know exactly what will happen next. I just know that it won’t be the same as what has happened in the past.

item.title: The Left Has Never Been Held Accountable For Political Violence — And That Must Change
item.description: Violence has long been weaved into the fabric of the American left, and until we honestly reckon with that, a bleak political future awaits.

item.title: Charlie Kirk Wasn’t Just Assassinated, He Was Martyred
item.description: Charlie Kirk wasn't ultimately killed for his second-order political beliefs but for his first-order belief in Jesus, out of which his other beliefs f...

item.title: Amid Charlie Kirk Assassination, Voter Intimidation Case Underscores The Left’s Violent Attempts To Silence Conservatives
item.description: “If the targets had been Democrats, there’d be arrests by now. This double standard is unacceptable," PILF's J. Christian Adams said.
